list.abs: ·总统府（presidential palace）：建于1929年，原名维多利亚宫，印度独立后，改为总统府。总统府是一座气势雄宏的宫殿式建筑， …

entry.def: Presidential activities or things relate or belong to a president.

means.word_mean: 1. relating to a president or presidency;
